Record.ParentTerm: Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor
Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Enzyme Inhibitor/Protein Kinase Inhibitor/Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor/Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor/BMS-599626
Record.BroaderTerm: Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor
Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: An orally bioavailable pan-HER tyrosine kinase inhibitor with potential antineoplastic activity. BMS-599626 inhibits human epidermal growth factor receptors (HER) HER1, HER2 and HER4, thereby inhibiting the proliferation of tumor cells that overexpress these receptors. (NCI05)
